root.name: Mahjongg Investigations: Under Suspicion
root.description: OverviewMahjongg Investigations: Under Suspicion is a Mahjong/puzzle game developed by ValuSoft and published by Oberon Media for the PC platform.System RequirementsOS: Windows 2000/XP/VistaProcessor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz or fasterGraphics Card: 32 MB video cardMemory: 256 MB RAMHard Drive Space: 100 MB free hard disk space
